result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew A. Spek

defendant.name: Spek, Matthew A.
defendant.address: 720 South Cogswell Drive #210, Silver Lake, WI 53170

records.addlTxt:
NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney David Patton in court for Matthew A. Spek. Defendant Matthew A. Spek appeared by video, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke. DE is in custody on a PO hold and believes he has a revocation of probation. Attorney Patton states he needs to speak with the DE about other matters and an offer.
Status conference scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of Hearing for DE returned. No mail receptacle.  Unable to forward.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on September 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Due to a conflict in Attorney Patton's calendar the JPTC of 09/01/22 at 10:00 has been reset to 09/21/22 at 11:00.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Amy S.

01:18 PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Kristyne Watson.   Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 01:15 pm.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.. DE is on PO Hold. $750 Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). Complaint orally amended to change Mother's name to Spek. rb
and witness list filed by the State
